about_the_game:
"As the same chain fastens the prisoner and the soldier who guards them, so fear and hope, dissimilar as they are, keep step together. 

Each belongs to a mind that is in suspense, a mind looking forward to the future. Our memory recalls the tortures of fear, while foresight anticipates them.

The present alone makes no person wretched."

  • Seneca, Letter V

🔹🔹🔹

You awake on a path in a strange forest with no idea how you got there or why you are there. There is nothing in your possession outside of the clothes on your back. Shaking off a thick drowsiness and as your mind clears you become determined to find an explanation.

Explore a strange, new world where things may not be quite what they seem.

A unique decision-based narrative where you choose different paths through the story. The game features intriguing character interactions, challenging puzzles, games of chance and hidden clues that change depending on the choices you make.

What truths will you uncover, which paths will you follow and where will they take you?

What will your story be?

content_descriptors.notes: Limited fear & non-sexual violence scenario descriptions (e.g. injury to self from falling). Certain paths contain text descriptions of terror/death scenarios that may be considered graphic by some viewers.
